segments.text: what do you think of studying abroad ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think it's a great idea . Studying abroad will offer you plenty of new opportunities . Are you planning on going abroad ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yes , I hope so . I am studying for my BELTS right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: which country do you want to go to ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd like to study in the UK , but it's really expensive .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: have you applied to any schools there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: yes , I received a conditional offer from Oxford University a few days ago .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: congratulations ! That's excellent news ? What do you have to do to get an unconditional offer ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have to get an BELTS score of 7.5 overall . Do you think I can do that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: if you study hard , I don't see why you wouldn't . Have you received any other offers ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was also accepted into Yale University , and Sydney University .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: if you're worried about money , the cost of living is lowest in America . However , if you go to Oxford University , you'll probably be able to get any job you want in the future .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just can't decide where to go . It's not an easy decision to make .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: if I were you , I'd apply for some scholarships and grants before you decide . Whatever you do , I know you'll succeed .
segments.speaker: S2
